dcterms:description: The WASSA 2018 Implicit Emotion Shared Task (IEST) aimed to predict the emotion of a word excluded from a tweet, focusing on emotions such as sadness, joy, disgust, surprise, anger, and fear.
dcterms:title: WASSA 2018 Implicit Emotion Shared Task (IEST)

Tomas Mikolov
Mike Schuster

Thorsten Brants

dcterms:description: The 1 Billion Word Language Model Benchmark is a dataset for measuring progress in statistical language modeling, containing approximately 800 million tokens of news crawl data.
dcterms:title: 1 Billion Word Language Model Benchmark

dcterms:creator: Saif M. Mohammad
Felipe Bravo-Marquez
dcterms:description: The WASSA-2017 Shared Task on Emotion Intensity focused on predicting the intensity of emotions expressed in text, providing a benchmark for emotion intensity classification.
dcterms:title: WASSA-2017 Shared Task on Emotion Intensity
